alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 29 at 10:07AM CDT until April 02 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Carthage. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of low areas along and near the river is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...With rainfall expected tomorrow afternoon, the river will fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight to 15.8 feet and then begin rising Thursday morning. It will then rise back to the flood stage of 17.0 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Carthage 17.0 18.0 Tue 8 am CDT 16.3 16.0 17.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
